ban.description: Bans a member from the server for the reason specified. Sets a mod log if you have a moderation log channel configured.

kick.description: Kicks a member from the server for the reason specified. Sets a mod log if you have a moderation log channel configured.

mute.description: Mutes a member from speaking in all text channels. Please don't change the name of the role 'YzbotMuted', that it creates, otherwise, when someone else is to be muted, yzbot will recreate the role and readd it. Sets a mod log if you have a moderation log channel configured.

hackban.description: Bans a user by ID - does not work if the member is in the server. Sets a mod log if you have a moderation log channel configured.

clear.description: Clears the specified amount of messages from the current channel.

role add.description: Adds a role to a member of the server. Role detection is case-sensitive, make sure you spell the role correctly.

role remove.description: Removes a role from a member of the server. Role detection is case-sensitive, make sure you spell the role correctly.

modlog set.description: Sets the server's moderation log to the channel specified.

modlog remove.description: Removes the server's moderation log if it is set.

prefix set.description: Sets yzbot's prefix for this server.

command disable.description: Disables a command from being used in the current server.

command listdisabled.description: Lists the disabled commands in the server, if any.

lenny.description: Sends a lenny face to the current channel.

8ball.description: Provides an answer taken from the wisdom and experience of the Magic 8 Ball, to the provided question.

choose.usage: (prefix)choose (option one | option two | option three) (there can be more)
choose.description: Randomly chooses one of the given options. 2 or more must be provided and you can provide as many as you like.

help.description: Sends help in your DMs about the specified category.

info.description: Provides information about the specified category. More information on specific categories are below.

user.description: Provides information about either yourself, or the user mentioned.

server.description: Provides information about the current server.

role.description: Provides information about the role specified.

channels.description: Sends the name of every single channel in the server to your DMs.

roles.description: Sends the name of every single role in the server to your DMs.

ping.description: Sends the bot's response time in milliseconds (ms).
